title: Ambulance

nouns: Health is a term referring to levels of functional or metabolic efficiency of living beings.
The avoidance of disease and injury and the promotion of normalcy through efficient use of the environment, a properly functioning society, and an inner sense of well-being.
A state of well-being or balance, often physical but sometimes also mental and social; the overall level of function of an organism from the cellular (micro) level to the social (macro) level.
Level of functional or metabolic efficiency of a living being
Health is the level of functional or metabolic efficiency of a living organism.
Overall level of function of an organism.
A healthy state of wellbeing free from disease
The medical state of physical, mental and social well-being.
A state of dynamic equilibrium between an organism and its environment in which all functions of mind and body are normal.
Health care institution
A place where people who are ill or injured are treated and taken care of by doctors and nurses.
A place where sick or injured people are cared for, especially a small hospital; sickhouse.
A health facility where patients receive treatment
A hospital is a health care institution providing patient treatment with specialized staff and equipment.
A place where sick or injured people are cared for, especially a small hospital.
Vehicle for transportation of sick or injured people
A vehicle that takes people to and from hospitals

An ambulance is a vehicle for transportation of sick or injured people to, from or between places of treatment for an illness or injury, and in some instances will also provide out of hospital medical care to the patient.
An emergency vehicle that transports sick or injured people to a hospital.
A vehicle designated for the transport of sick or injured people
Vehicle used to bring the sick or injured to a hospital.

description: An ambulance, used to transport patients between their home and the hospital.
apple_vendor_description: The ambulance emoji on Apple devices is a meticulously detailed representation, featuring a clean white body with striking red and blue emergency lights that gleam with Appleâ€™s signature glossy finish. Realistic lighting and subtle 3D shading give the vehicle a polished, almost tangible appearance, highlighting its smooth, rounded edges. This emoji is universally understood to signify urgency, medical emergencies, or a need for assistance, serving as a clear and direct visual cue in communications on Apple devices.
